My Creative Process

An unwavering attention to detail and pinointing the requirements of the clients form the backbone of my creative process.

1

Discuss The Project

It's always best to get all the details out of the way before attempting to go forward with any work. So the first step is finding out what the client wants, their vision and the constraints. Finding a realistic middle ground between these desires and constraints is essential for any successful project.

2

Determining Project Requirements

A client unfamiliar with the technology will not always be aware of what their options are or what they can realisticly expect. It's a developer's duty to inform them of what their requiremets are, as well as identify the set of "problems" the project aims to solve.

3

Planning Webpage Layout

A basic skeleton of the project streamlines the process of building the webpages and website.

4

Building and Delivery

Finally, the last step is to build the project and deliver the finished product for evaluation by the client.
